name: WormHole (Brakacée)
description:
Game made in GAME JAM (48h)

In WormHole, the snake's direction cannot be changed directly. Players must orient the portal before it is placed, in order to alter the snake's course.

Controls : 

Mouse Wheel : Rotate Portal

Left Click : Create Portal

Credits : 

ANDRE Axel

LEGORRE Joseph

MOTA Kévin

REBOLLEDO Mathieu
